rows.label: qev042201_MSG0001
rows.name:
When at last Nopon roots have spread over the land,
spirits shall appear...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0002
rows.name:
Shinshin saw it. Incarnation of the most sacred of all
the spirits...Divine Nopopon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire about Nopopon

rows.label: qev042201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Shinshin what the Divine Nopopon is.

rows.label: qev042201_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire about Location

rows.label: qev042201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask where Shinshin spotted this incarnation.

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0003
rows.name:
O, great and merciful spirits, forgive mighty ignorance
of poor heathen friend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0004
rows.name:
Heathen friend should mind tongue and repent
transgressions before all-seeing spirits drop their
hammer of smiteyness![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0005
rows.name:
*ahem* Friend should watch what [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] says.
Divine Nopopon is always listening.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0006
rows.name:
Divine Nopopon is mighty guardian deity who appears
wherever Nopon make their home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0007
rows.name:
And now that spirits have acknowledged Mira as true
home to Nopon, incarnation of Divine Nopopon has
appeared.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0008
rows.name:
Shinshin saw incarnation of Divine Nopopon while
strolling through Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0009
rows.name:
Comet of blue! Blaze of gold! Divine spirit is miracle
that illuminates entire world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0010
rows.name: Sparkly-shining form of spirit filled Shinshin with awe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0011
rows.name:
But Shinshin was unable to glimpse true form of
Divine Nopopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0012
rows.name: That privilege is reserved for true heropons only.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0013
rows.name:
Or so legends say. And friend knows it MUST be rare
sight if there are legends about it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_JNK0030
rows.name: Inquire about Seeing It

rows.label: qev042201_SEL0031
rows.name:
Ask Shinshin what you have to do in order
to see the true form of the Divine Nopopon.

rows.label: qev042201_JNK0040
rows.name: Inquire about Heropons

rows.label: qev042201_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Shinshin what constitutes a true heropon.

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0014
rows.name: Just beat incarnation of Divine Nopopon in combat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0015
rows.name:
Shinshin knows. Friend is thinking, "Oh, is that all?"
Well, friend should think again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0016
rows.name:
It is said that incarnation of Divine Nopopon can take
on form which commands living creatures around it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0017
rows.name:
It is without doubt more powerful than any being you
have ever, ever, ever-ever encountered. ...Ever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0018
rows.name:
It means one who is able to face even most
overwhelming of foes without flinching.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0019
rows.name:
Though even most iron-willed warrior who challenges
Divine Nopopon will die if skill does not match resolve.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0020
rows.name:
Shinshin is very interested in vast power Divine
Nopopon is said to bestow on worthy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0021
rows.name: Not to say that Shinshin wants power for herself![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0022
rows.name: Shinshin simply wish to see it with own two eyes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0023
rows.name:
Does friend have courage and confidence to defeat
incarnation of Divine Nopopon and win this power?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0024
rows.name: Fine answer, friend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0025
rows.name:
Shinshin spotted incarnation of Divine Nopopon inside
Whale's Weeper, in Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0026
rows.name:
It looked like cervus, but do not be fooled.
That is only shell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0027
rows.name:
One final warning for friend...
Do not lay down life in vain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0028
rows.name:
Shinshin spotted incarnation of Divine Nopopon in
Whale's Weeper, in Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0029
rows.name:
It looked like cervus, but do not be fooled.
That is only shell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0030
rows.name:
One final warning for friend...
Do not lay down life in vain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0034
rows.name:
Aaah! That blade! Sword of spirits!
Shinshin is witness to miracle of Divine Nopopon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0035
rows.name:
Although it look UNCANNILY like toy...
Er, is what ignorant heathen would say![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0036
rows.name:
Friend should wield it straightaway. Shinshin is sure
it is greatest weapon of them all, and will slay all evil
in single, mighty blow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042201_MSG0037
rows.name: Shinshin so grateful to have seen it in this lifetime.[ST:wait ]
